content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.#TempTable
    (
     [SchemaName] varchar(100),
     [TableName] varchar(100),
     [RecordsCount] BIGINT  )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.#TempTable
(SchemaName,TableName,RecordsCount)
FROM 'https://nithindatalakestorage.blob.core.windows.net/poc/configfiles/TablewiseRecordCount.csv'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
    --,FILE_FORMAT='csvFileformat'
    ,FIRSTROW = 2
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
   , ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
) 
 

 select * from  dbo.#TempTable
 where [SchemaName]+'.'+[TableName]=@
